title: Future Card Buddyfight
title_japanese: フューチャーカード バディファイト
synopsis: An adaptation of the Future Card Buddyfight card game. Future Card Buddyfight takes place in a more futuristic version of today. The card game connects to a parallel universe through special cards (Buddy Rare Cards) that act as portals. They bring monsters to Earth in order for them to become buddies with humans. Through friendship and courage, they take on and fight challenges, known as Buddyfights, where people of all ages have friendly non-hurtful competitions. The main character, Gaou Mikado has just started Buddyfighting. As the story progresses, Buddyfights are seeming to become a little too real...

Character.name: 40 Shuunen Da yo!! CoroCoro All-Star Shougakkou

opening_themes: #1: "Card of the Future" by Suara &  Psychic Lover (eps 1-46)
#2: "Buddy Buddy BAAAAAN!! (バディバディBAAAAAN!!)" by Gaou Mikado (Marie Mizuno) & Baku Oomori (Shuuta Morishima) (eps 47-64)
ending_themes: #3: "Shiny Up! (シャイニーアップ!)" by Hanako Mikado (Suzuko Mimori) (eps 47-??)
